3a9bc8ef-3895-4d6f-b28b-d40a97f72786.description: The Coach Global/ Coaching Australia Executive Coach Certification Programme (ECCP) is accredited by the International Coach Federation (ICF) and provides a pathway to an international credential. This cutting-edge programme is thorough and highly experiential, and includes structures, tools and unique and proven coaching models. An end to end programme supporting deep coaching capability in leaders and fully equipped executive coaches, who also benefit from a highly reflective experience.
3a9bc8ef-3895-4d6f-b28b-d40a97f72786.name: Coach Global | Coaching Australia "Executive Coach Certification Programme"

issuer.summary: issued by Coach Global | Coaching Australia

alignments.name: Approved Coach Specific Training Hours
alignments.description: The ECCP is approved by the International Coach Federation and provides 67.5 hours of coach specific training of which 55 hours are direct student contact. These hours satisfy the coach training hour requirements to support applications for the ICF’s Associate Certified Coach (ACC) international credential.

badge_template_activities.title: A highly experiential and practical programme spanning approx 4 months. Designed for deepening of self-awareness and personal growth of particpants to support full alignment to a coaching mindset. Provided as either 1) Live training or 2) Virtual training. The live version consists of 2 x 3-day face-to-face of core workshops. The virtual version consists of 12 x half days of core Zoom workshops. Feedback received against ICF international standards and competencies across the programme. .
Group Zoom Learning Forum Conference Calls facilitated by a ICF credentialed coach, supporting further practice, feedback and reinforcement of programme learning.

Four podcasts support live training providing a rich learning experience to deepen the live training content. Podcasts provide focus and tools on providing a structured coaching programme, as a leader or executive coach.
Additional Personal Learning Tasks including coaching practice outside of the live training with a peer coaching partner, strengthen coaching capability through practical application and feedback,

skills.name: Demonstrated Competency Of The PACT Model

53cc1d9d-4cd1-4a15-a5c4-3cadb68f9c4f.description: The "Coaching as a Leadership Style" programme is aligned to global coaching standards and competencies as defined by the ICF. A highly contextual and practical programme, it deepens coaching capability in leaders in organisations, increasing their effectiveness in their day to day leadership interactions. Outcomes include capability to empower, increase engagement, accountability and connection, as well as invite innovation. A highly reflective programme supporting increased self-awareness.
53cc1d9d-4cd1-4a15-a5c4-3cadb68f9c4f.name: Coach Global | Coaching Australia "Coaching as a Leadership Style" Programme

issuer.summary: issued by Coach Global | Coaching Australia

alignments.name: International Coaching Federation
alignments.description: Coaching as a Leadership Style is based in, and aligned to ICF competencies, standards and ethics, ensuring alignment to global coaching criteria

badge_template_activities.title: Delivered as either a blended learning programme or a fully virtual programme. Programme typically spans 3-4 months to support embedding of coaching skills and mindset. Provides structures, skills and unique models (including PACT and SSSHHH) for consistency of approach.
The Foundations of Coaching. Insight is provided to the core elements under-pinning a coaching approach. Inclusive of opportunity to self-reflect against current style and approach.
Coaching Communication Skills. Core coaching skills are introduced and practiced across programme. Consistent partner work provides opportunity to home skills and receive feedback.

Coaching Practice. Partner work is completed within the session as well as being scheduled as Personal Learning Tasks to deepen capability and understanding of the impact and benefits of coaching in the leader's own context.
Neuroscience. Connecting the success of coaching to neuroscience, and how coaching creates sustainable behavioural change
Coachable Moment Session Structure. Provides a structure and coaching model to support focussed, time-efficient and highly impactful coaching conversations.

skills.name: Demonstrated Proficiency Of The PACT Model

273c993f-2f6a-44eb-8c01-3c1f3a02af8e.description: The "Ignite Potential" Coaching programme is aligned to global coaching standards and competencies as defined by the International Coaching Federation. A highly contextual programme, it deepens coaching capability in leaders in organisations, increasing their effectiveness in their day to day leadership interactions. Outcomes include capability to empower, increase engagement. self-awareness and accountability. Provides models and frameworks for consistently impactful coaching conversations.
273c993f-2f6a-44eb-8c01-3c1f3a02af8e.name: Coach Global | Coaching Australia "Ignite Potential" Coaching Programme

a182a3d3-0082-467a-ba32-f77d657026b6.description: The "HR as Coach" programme is aligned to global coaching standards and competencies as defined by the International Coaching Federation. A highly contextual programme, it deepens coaching capability in HR leaders in organisations, increasing their effectiveness in their day to day HR and leadership interactions. Outcomes include capability to empower, increase engagement. self-awareness and accountability. Forms the foundations of a coaching culture as HR leaders role-model coaching impact.

71d7af0a-9245-4270-b66a-2a1721decab1.description: The Refresher Programme is available exclusively to our ECCP Alumni, to add depth and confidence to their existing coaching knowledge.
